TopicTitle: [1.0.4] ACP-v7 - Atmo, Auroras, Stratus/Cirrus clouds, Lightning, Dust storms, Bioluminescence

Articles.Content:
Avera9e's Cloud Pack

I was originally planning on keeping this mod in the comments of the
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements?p=2034955&viewfull=1#post2034955

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This pack is dependent on the Environmental Visual Enhancement Sept. 5th release, which was created by Rbray89. Download it [**HERE**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements).

> 
> ACP-v8 Changelog
> 
>  \* Copyrights reviewed and needed textures replaced
> 
>  \* New main cloud texture for Kerbin, laythe, duna, and lightning
> 
> ACP-v7 Changelog
> 
>  \* Added better bioluminescence to laythe
> 
>  \* Lightning strikes more visible
> 
>  \* Improved clouds for Duna, polls are white, midlands are red-brown
> 
>  \* Dust on surface of minmus
> 
>  \* Atmosphere's for planets!!
> 
> Avg's Cloud Pack-v6 Changelog
> 
>  \* Added bioluminescence to Laythe
> 
>  \* Added Lightning to Eve, Kerbin, Duna, and Laythe (Adding more numerous strikes next release)
> 
> Avg's Cloud Pack-v5 Changelog
> 
>  \* Added sandstorms to Duna
> 
>  \* Removed duplicate .png particle textures I forgot to delete... oops
> 
> Avg's Cloud Pack-v4 Changelog
> 
>  \* Eve - Added purple-tinted auroras, 5 layers of clouds
> 
>  \* Kerbin - Added auroras, stratus clouds, stratus cloud shadows, cirrus clouds
> 
>  \* Jool - Added green-tinted auroras, Equatorial bands, Temperate bands (that rotate counter-clockwise)
> 
>  \* Laythe - Added blue-tinted auroras, stratus clouds, stratus cloud shadows, cirrus clouds

- A note about .dds conversions, textures converted to .dds have different transparency properties than .pngs, and thus they do not work with volumetric clouds. All textures that do not not volume have been converted to .dds, but I cannot optimize the rest, sadly ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif).

The sad thing is that volumetric clouds doesn't work when you convert to .dds. It messes with transparency and causes the plugin to place volumetric clouds everywhere or in long strips. I compressed all the images that don't use volume though (I.E. the aurora and shadow textures).
